mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PARTNER(PARTNERNUM, ID, PARTNEREMAIL, PARTNERACCOUNT, PARTNERDATE, PARTNERNAME, PARTNERPHONE, COMPANYNAME) VALUES(#{partnerNum}, #{id}, #{partnerEmail}, #{partnerAccount}, #{partnerDate}, #{partnerName}, #{partnerPhone}, #{companyName})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM PARTNER PT LEFT OUTER JOIN PRODUCT PD ON PT.PARTNERNUM = PD.PARTNERNUM WHERE PT.PARTNERNUM = #{partnerNum}

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM R, P.* FROM (SELECT * FROM PARTNER WHERE PARTNERNUM>0 AND PARTNERNUM LIKE '%' || #{search} || '%' AND PARTNERCHECK=0 ORDER BY PARTNERNUM DESC)P) WHERE R BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{lastRow}

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM R, P.* FROM (SELECT * FROM PARTNER WHERE PARTNERNUM>0 AND PARTNERNUM LIKE '%' || #{search} || '%' AND PARTNERCHECK=1 ORDER BY PARTNERNUM DESC)P) WHERE R BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{lastRow}
SELECT COUNT(PARTNERNUM) FROM PARTNER WHERE PARTNERCHECK=0
SELECT COUNT(PARTNERNUM) FROM PARTNER WHERE PARTNERCHECK=1
